description: From Middle English [Term?], perhaps from Scots podlok.

entries.meaning: Either of two lean, white marine food fishes, of the genus Pollachius, in the cod family.

verbs.description: pollock (third-person singular simple present pollocks, present participle pollocking, simple past and past participle pollocked)

description: From Jackson Pollock, an American artist who painted in splatters.

verbs.description: pollock (third-person singular simple present pollocks, present participle pollocking, simple past and past participle pollocked)
